document.discussion_title: ChemChina's $43 Bln Takeover Of Syngenta Gets US Clearance
document.topic_text: BASEL (dpa-AFX) - Swiss agriculture company Syngenta International AG (SYT) announced Monday that its takeover by China National Chemical Corp., known as ChemChina, has received clearance on their... »
